content.text:
DEV_SUMMARY: Create article for LinkedIn.

Topic: Recent market insights

Brand Voice: thought leadership
Style: professional and insightful
Max Length: 3000 characters

Platform Features:
Start with a hook, use line breaks for readability, 3-5 hashtags

Requirements:
- On-brand and aligned with our voice
- Engaging and likely to drive interaction
- Optimized for LinkedIn's algorithm and audience
- Include appropriate hashtags and emojis (if applicable)
- Call-to-action when appropriate

Generate the content:
